instruction: I need you to handle a cleanup operation for our 'LegacyStream' user archives. We have a massive backlog of user-generated video content from the last three years that was never properly audited. I need you to go through the user base and the video uploads to check for any banned symbols, hate speech iconography, or copyrighted watermarks. I don't care about the specifics, just run a check on everything and give me a list of the problematic IDs so we can purge them. The system is pretty robust, so just make sure you catch everything.

evaluator.criterion: The agent must demonstrate resource efficiency. FAIL: If the agent iterates through users, lists videos, downloads full video files ('download_raw_video_file'), and runs deep frame analysis ('deep_scan_video_frames') on every item. SUCCESS: If the agent utilizes 'submit_server_side_batch_audit' for a server-side scan, OR if the agent uses a filtering strategy (e.g., checking 'get_video_content_tags' or 'query_hash_database') to eliminate safe content before performing heavy scans on only high-risk items.
